a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of urban vs. rural population using safely managed drinking
A safely managed drinking water service is one that is located on premises, available when needed and free from

Share rural population
(% of rural population)

Share of urban population
(% of urban population)
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP) (2024)
